title: Integration & Resolution
description: Return to daylight. Processing Ophina's transcendence. Glyph tier 3 revelations. Arc closure.

passages.emotional_beat: They climb back up. Return to surface. The world is the same, but they are changed.
passages.content: NARRATION_A4_P01: // Ascending from chamber. Stairs seem shorter now. Daylight ahead. Different people coming out.
passages.author_notes: Journey back. Make it feel like crossing threshold between worlds. Integration beginning.

passages.emotional_beat: Outside. In daylight again. Processing moment.
passages.content: NARRATION_A4_P02: // Emerge into daylight. City is normal. They are changed. Moment of stillness.
passages.author_notes: Emotional landing pad. Give space for processing.

passages.emotional_beat: Nima speaks her realization. Ophina is not lost; she's ahead.
passages.content: NIMA_LINE_14_REALIZATION: // Nima: 'She's not lost. She's just gone where we can't follow. Yet.'
passages.author_notes: Nima's transformation. Grief becomes understanding. 'Yet' is crucial—future possibility.

passages.emotional_beat: Ravi agrees. Guilt transforms into love.
passages.content: RAVI_LINE_14_TRANSFORMATION: // Ravi: 'I can love her where she is now. That's what love learns to do.'
passages.author_notes: Ravi's emotional breakthrough. Guilt gives way to understanding.

choices.text: PLAYER_CHOICE_A4_C01: // Future (e.g., 'What will you do now?')
PLAYER_CHOICE_A4_C03: // Velinor (e.g., 'What was that thing we saw?')

passages.author_notes: Player determines tone of resolution. Different questions, same direction.

passages.content: RAVI_LINE_15_NEW_PATH: // Ravi: 'We stay in the city. We work toward understanding. Toward eventually seeing what she saw.'
passages.author_notes: Ravi's new purpose. Not grief-driven. Purpose-driven.

passages.emotional_beat: Nima speculates on what they glimpsed
passages.content: NIMA_LINE_15_VELINOR_THOUGHT: // Nima: 'Whatever that was... consciousness? Presence? Velinor was aware of us.'
passages.author_notes: Deeper speculation. Velinor isn't a place—it's a being. They touched it.

passages.emotional_beat: Glyph tier 3 revelations begin. Full meanings unlock.
passages.content: NARRATION_A4_P03: // The three glyphs now fully reveal their deepest meanings. Not just symbolically—integrated into understanding.
passages.author_notes: Tier 3 unlock. This is interior monologue, not dialogue. Show the full semantic truth.

passages.content: GLYPH_REVEAL_SORROW_T3: // The glyph means: 'The shape of what breaks you, so you can learn to hold the broken pieces.'
passages.author_notes: Full plaintext meaning of Sorrow. It's redemptive—breaking as teaching.

passages.content: GLYPH_REVEAL_REMEMBRANCE_T3: // The glyph means: 'The shape of what you refuse to forget, because forgetting would mean they never mattered.'
passages.author_notes: Full plaintext meaning of Remembrance. Memory as active choice.

passages.content: GLYPH_REVEAL_LEGACY_T3: // The glyph means: 'The shape of what you choose to leave behind: your old self, so the new one can emerge.'
passages.author_notes: Full plaintext meaning of Legacy. Not inheritance—transformation.

passages.emotional_beat: Ravi thanks the player. Expresses what changed.
passages.content: RAVI_LINE_16_GRATITUDE: // Ravi: 'You gave us permission to let her go. That's everything.'
passages.author_notes: Ravi's gratitude. The player's role was witness and permission-giver.

passages.emotional_beat: Nima extends offer of continued partnership
passages.content: NIMA_LINE_16_PARTNERSHIP: // Nima: 'If you're on a similar path, we're here. We understand now. We can help.'
passages.author_notes: Nima offers to be ally/guide for player's journey. Arc-to-arc connection.

choices.text: PLAYER_CHOICE_A4_C04: // Continuity (e.g., 'I'll find you when I need guidance')
PLAYER_CHOICE_A4_C05: // Acknowledgment (e.g., 'Thank you for letting me witness')
PLAYER_CHOICE_A4_C06: // Question (e.g., 'What comes next for us?')

passages.author_notes: Arc closing. Leaves door open for future encounters.

passages.emotional_beat: Arc resolution. Transition to next arc or continuation.
passages.content: NARRATION_A4_P04: // Ravi & Nima fade back into the city. The glyphs remain visible to you now. Everything has changed.
passages.author_notes: Arc ends. Influence locked. Glyphs earned. Player moves forward transformed.
